value.halfverse: and their inheritance shall last for ever.
value.verse: The LORD cares for the lives of the godly, *
They shall not be ashamed in bad times, *
value.halfverse: and in days of famine they shall have enough.

and the enemies of the LORD, like the glory of the meadows, shall vanish;
 they shall vanish like smoke.
value.verse: As for the wicked, they shall perish, *

value.halfverse: but the righteous are generous in giving.
value.verse: The wicked borrow and do not repay, *
Those who are blessed by God shall possess the land, *
value.halfverse: but those who are cursed by him shall be destroyed.

value.verse: Our steps are directed by the LORD; *
value.halfverse: he strengthens those in whose way he delights.

value.verse: If they stumble, they shall not fall headlong, *
value.halfverse: for the LORD holds them by the hand.

value.verse: I have been young and now I am old, *
value.halfverse:
but never have I seen the righteous forsaken,
 or their children begging bread.

value.verse: The righteous are always generous in their lending, *
value.halfverse: and their children shall be a blessing.
and dwell in the land for ever.
value.verse: Turn from evil, and do good, *

value.halfverse: he does not forsake his faithful ones.
value.verse: For the LORD loves justice; *

value.halfverse: but the offspring of the wicked shall be destroyed.
value.verse: They shall be kept safe for ever, *
The righteous shall possess the land *
value.halfverse: and dwell in it for ever.
and their tongue speaks what is right.
value.verse: The mouth of the righteous utters wisdom, *
The law of their God is in their heart, *
value.halfverse: and their footsteps shall not falter.
and seek occasion to kill them.
value.verse: The wicked spy on the righteous *
The LORD will not abandon them to their hand, *
value.halfverse: nor let them be found guilty when brought to trial.

he will raise you up to possess the land,
 and when the wicked are cut off, you will see it.
value.verse: Wait upon the LORD and keep his way; *

value.halfverse: flourishing like a tree in full leaf.
value.verse: I have seen the wicked in their arrogance, *

value.halfverse: I searched for them, but they could not be found.
value.verse: I went by, and behold, they were not there; *

value.halfverse: for there is a future for the peaceable.
value.verse:
Mark those who are honest;
observe the upright; *

value.halfverse: the future of the wicked is cut off.
value.verse: Transgressors shall be destroyed, one and all; *

value.halfverse: he is their stronghold in time of trouble.
value.verse: But the deliverance of the righteous comes from the LORD; *
The LORD will help them and rescue them; *
value.halfverse:
he will rescue them from the wicked and deliver them,
 because they seek refuge in him.
